      • args

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> args(java.lang.Object... keysAndValues)
        Convenience method to combine a list of strings into a map. Sample usage:
        Map<String, String> mapOfArguments = args("key1", "value1", "key2", "value2");
        would result in this: 
         {
     "key1" => "value1",
     "key2" => "value2"
 }
        Parameters:
        keysAndValues - A list of objects to be turned into strings and condensed into a map. Must be of even length and all values must be non-null
        Returns:
        A map of the given keys and values array
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the amount of parameters is not even
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If an element in the array was null

      • isFullName

        public static boolean isFullName(java.lang.String name)
        Tests if the given string could possibly be the full name of an Thing. In order to pass, the first character must be "t", the second character must be a digit in the range of 1-8, the third character must be an underscore, and the rest of the letters must be alphanumeric. See here for more information.
        Parameters:
        name - The String to test
        Returns:
        If the name given could be a Thing's full name

      • parseJson

        public static <T extends RedditObject> T parseJson(org.codehaus.jackson.JsonNode rootNode,
                                   java.lang.Class<T> thingClass)
        Parses a JsonNode into a RedditObject
        Type Parameters:
        T - The return type
        Parameters:
        rootNode - The root node of the Thing. Should only contain two elements: "kind", and "data".
        thingClass - The type of Thing this JsonNode should be turned into
        Returns:
        A new RedditObject

      • typeComparison

        public static boolean typeComparison(com.squareup.okhttp.MediaType t1,
                     com.squareup.okhttp.MediaType t2)
        Compares the type and subtype of two MediaTypes.
        Parameters:
        t1 - The first MediaType
        t2 - The second MediaType
        Returns:
        True, if t1.type().equals(t2.type()) and t1.subtype().equals(t2.subtype()), false if else.

      • getSubredditPath

        public static java.lang.String getSubredditPath(java.lang.String subreddit,
                                java.lang.String path)
        Prepends "/r/{subreddit}" to path if subreddit is not null
        Parameters:
        subreddit - The subreddit to use
        path - The path to use
        Returns:
        "/r/{subreddit}/{path}" if subreddit is not null, otherwise "{path}"

      • toJson

        public static java.lang.String toJson(java.lang.Object o)
        Serializes an object to a JSON string
        Returns:
        The JSON interpretation of the object
